sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { PayPalButton } from 'react-paypal-button-v2' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails, payOrder } from '../actions/orderActions' import { ORDER_PAY_RESET } from '../constants/orderConstants' const OrderScreen = ({match}) => { const orderId = match.params.id const [sdkReady, setSdkReady] = useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const { order, loading, error } = orderDetails const orderPay = useSelector(state => state.orderPay ) const { loading:loadingPay , success:successPay } = orderPay if(!loading){ const orderMap = order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( item.qty * item.price )) console.log(orderMap) order.itemsPrice = orderMap.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item, 0 ) console.log(order.itemsPrice) } const successPaymentHandler = (paymentResult) =>{ console.log(paymentResult) dispatch(payOrder(orderId, paymentResult)) } useEffect(() => { const addPayPalScript = async () => { const { data: clientId } = await axios.get('/api/config/paypal') const script = document.createElement('script') script.type = 'text/javascript' script.src = `https://www.paypal.com/sdk/js?client-id=${clientId}` script.async = true script.onload = () => { setSdkReady(true) } document.body.appendChild(script) } if(!order || successPay){ dispatch( { type : ORDER_PAY_RESET}) dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) }else if(!order.isPaid){ if(!window.paypal){ addPayPalScript() }else { setSdkReady(true) } } }, [ dispatch ,orderId, order, successPay]) return loading ? : error ? {error} : <>

주문번호 {order._id}

배송지

이름 : {order.user.name}

이메일 : {order.user.email}

주소 : {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

{order.isDelived ? ( 배달완료 {order.DelivedAt} ) : ( 배달준비 )}

결제 방법

지불 선택 : {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( 결제완료 {order.paidAt} ) : ( 미결제 )}

주문 상품

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? 주문이 없습니다 : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.price}원 X {item.qty}개 = {item.qty * item.price}원 ))} )}

주문 요약

 주문 상품 {order.itemsPrice} 원 배송비 {order.shippingPrice}원 관세 및 부과세 {order.taxPrice}원 주문 총액 {order.totalPrice}원 {!order.isPaid && ( {loadingPay && } {!sdkReady ? ( ) : ( )} )} } export default OrderScreen
